column4: soreau: yes thought so, this looks good, do you have anything in /var/www ?
I think he's got too few RAM for compiz to work properly
well yes, that's a little short for compiz
compiz only needs 64MB of vram to run and can run on less. For system ram, even 512mb is plenty
well I've never been able to run compiz until I got 2GB
Then you were doing something very wrong
Compiz only requires 64mb of vram to run and can run on less. For system ram, 512 is plenty
well if you say so... anyway, he'll be able to test
